description.value: While in @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feats-srd.Ricochet Stance (Rogue)]{Ricochet Stance}, you can bounce a thrown weapon off a foe to distract them. You can attempt a @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Feint]{Feint} against a creature within the first range increment of a thrown weapon you are wielding, rather than only creatures within your melee reach.
